LocalizationPackage.Text: Oxygen generation is essential for sustaining life in underwater habitats. Each base compartment consumes oxygen, and larger or more complex bases require greater oxygen production to remain habitable. Specialized oxygen generators convert water into breathable air, powered by the base's energy reserves. To ensure safe atmospheric conditions, install sufficient generators to match your base's size and monitor oxygen levels as you expand or modify your habitat.
A fragment of a large oxygen generator. Scan to learn more.
